comments:
Build ID: Latest build

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new lib
2.Create a plugin named PlugA
3.Export the lib as xml
4. Delete PlugA
5. Create a new plugin in also named PlugA
6. Import the previous exported xml lib
Result: there is rename error message popup, and import failed with the following exception in log:

org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MultiFileIOException: Could not rename 'C:\Libs\72\a\new_plug-in\plugin.xmi' to 'C:\Libs\72\a\new_plug-in_renamed\plugin.xmi'
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MultiFileXMIResourceImpl.commit(MultiFileXMIResourceImpl.java:1072)
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MethodLibraryPersister$FailSafePersister.commit(MethodLibraryPersister.java:812)
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MethodLibraryPersister$FailSafePersister.adjustLocation(MethodLibraryPersister.java:741)
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.actions.RenameAction$RenameCommand.adjustLocation(RenameAction.java:349)
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.actions.RenameAction$RenameCommand.adjustLocation(RenameAction.java:336)
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.actions.RenameAction$RenameCommand.access$0(RenameAction.java:327)
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.actions.RenameAction$RenameCommand$1.run(RenameAction.java:395)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.ui.UserInteractionHelper$6.run(UserInteractionHelper.java:524)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)


More information:

This senarios works in EPF 1.0. The regression is due to some neccessary and good refactoring changes in persistency rename code. Please assign it to Phong for a look. Assign it back to me in case if the accomodating change in xml import is neccessary.
Fixed in xml import to accomodate the change in persistency.
